7.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Amr bin Aws said:"A man of Thaqif told us that he heard the caller of the Messenger of Allah (S.A.W) on a rainy night during a journey saying: 'Hayya 'ala as-salah, Hayya 'ala al'falah, sallu fi rihalikum (Come to prayer, come to prosperity, pray in your dwellings)

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَذَانِ فِي التَّخَلُّفِ عَنْ شُهُودِ الْجَمَاعَةِ، فِي اللَّيْلَةِ الْمَطِيرَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Adhan Telling People Not To Come To Prayer in Congregation On A Rainy Night
